channel.description: Recent content in Evidence Analysis on Analyst

item.title: Overview
item.description: SANS Six-Part Methodology Used to identify malicious processses: Identify rogue processes Analyze DLLs and handles Review network artifacts Look for code injection Check for any signs of a rootkit Dump suspicious process and drivers

item.description: SIP More on SIP. SIP prevents imaging of a live system. Can be disabled: # Boot into recovery mode by pressing CMD+R on restart # Open Terminal csrutil disable # Restart
